title: When you try to make granola bars but it instead turns into granola (yes, please laugh!)
description: So, I was going to do another Mini Meal Prep Session yesterday. I only had an hour, but I had planned to make homemade granola bars, marinated chicken, and mac & cheese with browned ground beef. Since we loved the Homemade Granola Bars I made recently, I got the ingredients so I could finally tryRead More
author: Crystal Paine
